column1: Little Goat Diner////I'll be honest: I've never been to Little Goat
column2: or Chicago for that matter. What I have done
column4: is business with them. I was putting together a Valentine's surprise for my girlfriend who had been wanting to try Stumptown Cold Brew coffee. Well
column5: the main office for Stumptown was unable to ship any straight to me
column6: but they gave me the names of a couple locations closer. Sure enough
column7: Little Goat carried the drink and was willing to ship me some! The surprise went over very well! I have only good things to say about the staff of Little Goat
column8: especially Sonja who I worked with directly to make my Valentine's Day happen. If you're looking for hospitality and kindness
column9: Little Goat is the way to go
